Detailed Description

This class represents the sum of squares error performance functional of a multilayer perceptron. This performance functional is used in data modeling problems.

See also:
MultilayerPerceptron.

InputTargetDataSet.

Definition at line 29 of file GoodyModel.h.

Vector< double > Purple::GoodyModel::getGradient ( Vector< double >  argument  ) 

This method returns the the sum-of-squares-error function gradient of a multilayer perceptron on an argument-target data set. It uses the error back-propagation method.

See also:
getPerformanceFunctionGradient2(void).

getPerformance(void).
